VoiceList.Entry: “No good. We have to catch it!”
Aeris “You must be tired.” Yeah I want to go home
Aeris “Just hang in there. Someday we'll look back on these hard times and laugh.”
Aeris “Yeah. But it'll all be over soon!”
“The Guard that escaped with the key to the door moves on a set course.”
“Memorize the doors he enters and exits to figure out the pattern and catch him at an exit.”
“Oh yeah,oh yeah… you can jump down to the ramp below and to the left of the screen.”
Cloud “It probably won't hurt if I jump from here…" Jump Don't do it
